00013 class ReactionRate {
00014  public:
00015   ReactionRate(CNuc *compound, const std::vector<double>&params, 
00016                const Config &configure, int entranceKey, int exitKey) : 
00017     configure_(configure) {
00018     compound_=compound;
00019     compound_->FillCompoundFromParams(params);
00020     entrance_key_=entranceKey;
00021     exit_key_=exitKey;
00022     
00023     EPoint *point = new EPoint(55.0,3.523,entranceKey,exitKey,false,false,0.0,0);
00024     point->Initialize(compound,configure);
00025     point->Calculate(compound,configure);
00026     constSFactor_=point->GetFitCrossSection()*point->GetSFactorConversion();  
00027   };
00028   double constSFactor() const {return constSFactor_;};
00029   CNuc *compound() const {return compound_;};
00030   const Config &configure() const {return configure_;};
00031   int entranceKey() const {return entrance_key_;};
00032   int exitKey() const {return exit_key_;};
